title: Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 Plus tipped to arrive with other Qualcomm chips later this month
content:
The Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 has powered some of 2022’s best smartphones, but it seems an evolution on that chip is incoming. According to a new report, the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 Plus is finally getting a release date later this month.

more…

The post Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 Plus tipped to arrive with other Qualcomm chips later this month appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, Qualcomm has set a release date in late May for the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 Plus chip, expected in Samsung's foldables.
